title: Reign to Ravage
description: The savage need for her threatens his throneKnowing his future is tied to her in more ways than one, he is prepared to destroy every obstacle between them to repair what he has done and get her back under his control, whether she accepts it or not.Destroyed by King Malloron, Amara discoveries that could give her the chance to escape her existence.However, when the king makes her another offer, she finds herself at risk of devastation, in the most brutal, carnal, and deepest of ways. REIGN TO RAVAGE is a full-length fantasy romance novel that continues Malloron and Amara's dark and carnal, magical tale. Start their story at Reign To Ruin. For fans of faithful Alpha anti-heroes and captive romances. Cliffhanger included however this trilogy is complete.This series includes romance and situations of a dark nature. Some aspects of this may be sensitive for some readers. For ages 18+
author: Zoey Ellis
